name: DataExportPanel

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Display mode: 'ui' for visible interface, 'headless' for programmatic-only usage

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of objects to export (for table data)

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Column configuration: [{key: 'field', label: 'Display Name', width: 100}]

properties.name: filename
properties.description: Base filename for exports (without extension)

properties.name: formats
properties.description: Available export formats: ['csv', 'excel', 'pdf']

properties.name: position
properties.description: UI position: 'top', 'bottom', 'inline', 'floating'

properties.name: buttonStyle
properties.description: Button style: 'button', 'icon', 'dropdown', 'menu'

properties.name: buttonText
properties.description: Custom button text

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Font Awesome icon class for the export button

properties.name: showPreview
properties.description: Show preview before export (UI mode only)

properties.name: allowColumnSelection
properties.description: Allow users to select which columns to export

properties.name: includeHeaders
properties.description: Include column headers in export

properties.name: dateFormat
properties.description: Date format for date values

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: Number formatting options: {decimals: 2, thousandsSeparator: ',', decimalSeparator: '.'}

properties.name: pdfOptions
properties.description: PDF-specific options: {orientation: 'portrait'|'landscape', pageSize: 'a4'|'letter', margins: {top: 40, bottom: 40, left: 40, right: 40}, title: 'Custom Title', includeDataTable: boolean, multiPage: boolean, includeAIInsights: boolean}

properties.name: excelOptions
properties.description: Excel-specific options: {sheetName: 'Data', includeFilters: true, autoWidth: true}

properties.name: getHtmlElement
properties.description: Function that returns the HTML element to capture for PDF export (alternative to data array)

properties.name: getAiInsightsElement
properties.description: Function that returns the AI insights element to include in PDF export (optional)

properties.name: aiInsightsText
properties.description: Raw markdown text of AI insights to render as text in PDF (preferred over element capture)

properties.name: onExportStart
properties.description: Callback fired when export begins

properties.name: onExportComplete
properties.description: Callback fired when export completes successfully

properties.name: onExportError
properties.description: Callback fired if export fails

properties.name: customStyles
properties.description: Custom styles for the export panel UI

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Control visibility of the UI (for UI mode)
